A non-intrusive Github bot that helps yo: A non-intrusive Github bot that helps you manage your repositories issues and pull requests with AI-powered moderation.
To get the bot working in your repositor: To get the bot working in your repository all you need to do is install it on Github Marketplace.
You can access your incivilized comments: You can access your incivilized comments and repositories analysis by logging in with your Github account.
The bot is very easy to use and doesn't: The bot is very easy to use and doesn't require any configuration, with the analysis of the comments starting automatically.
The bot doesn't interfere with your comm: O bot não interfere com seus comentários.
We are a team of developers who are pass: We are a team of developers who are passionate about creating tools that help people manage their repositories issues and pull requests.
We are a team of passionate and dedicate: We are a team of passionate and dedicated individuals who are committed to making a positive impact on the world through their work. We believe in the power of technology to bring people together and create a better future.
Incivilized comments on issues and pull: Incivilized comments on issues and pull requests
Aprenda, passo a passo, como começar a u: Learn, step by step, how to start using the
para monitorar e manter a civilidade nos: to monitor and keep the civility in your repositories GitHub.
O primeiro passo é adicionar o Peacemake: The first step is to add the Peacemaker Bot as a GitHub App to your repository:
Autentique-se no GitHub e escolha o(s) r: Sign in to GitHub and choose the repository(ies) where the bot will have permission to act.
Dica você pode instalar em mais de um re: Tip you can install in more than one repository, but remember to choose only those you want to monitor.
Assim que alguém (inclusive você!) fizer: As soon as someone (including you!) makes a comment with language considered incivilized in one of the allowed repositories, the bot will:
Detectar o comentário e calcular um scor: Detect the comment and calculate a toxicity score.
Classificar o comentário como incivil ou: Classify the comment as incivil or civil
Gerar sugestões de reformulação para tor: Generate suggestions to make the text more friendly.
Exibir, na aba Incivilities, o comentári: Display, in the Incivilities tab, the original comment, the incivility classification and the suggestions.
Na aba Incivilities, você tem três opçõe: In the Incivilities tab, you have three options for each suggestion:
confirma a sugestão e substitui o texto: confirms the suggestion and replaces the text in GitHub.
ajusta a sugestão manualmente antes de a: adjusts the suggestion manually before applying.
descarta aquela sugestão e gera uma nova: discards that suggestion and generates a new one.
Antes de aceitar qualquer sugestão autom: Before accepting any automatic suggestion, you need to provide a Personal Access Token (PAT) from GitHub with permission to modify comments. Without it, the bot will not be able to replace the text.
Acesse sua conta no GitHub e vá em: Sett: Access your GitHub account and go to: Settings Developer settings  Personal access tokens.
Clique em Generate new token e selecione: Click on Generate new token and select the scope repo (or just public_repo, if it is a public repository).
Copie o token gerado e salve-o em um loc: Copy the generated token and save it in a secure location.
No painel do Peacemaker Bot, abra Config: In the Peacemaker Bot panel, open Settings (gear icon in the profile) and paste your token.
Quando você edita e submete uma sugestão: When you edit and submit a suggestion:
O bot reanalisa o texto editado em busca: The bot reanalyzes the edited text in search of traces of incivility.
Você vê um alerta informando que o texto: You see an alert indicating that the text is not yet ok.
Novas sugestões são geradas para melhora: New suggestions are generated to improve again.
Se, após duas edições, ainda houver inci: If, after two edits, there is still incivility, the bot stops suggesting and displays a final alert.
O bot não detecta mais incivilidade e ma: The bot no longer detects incivility and marks the comment as resolved.
Parabéns! A conversa está num tom saudáv: Congratulations! The conversation is in a healthy tone.
Atenção: esse fluxo evita que você fique: Attention: this flow prevents you from getting stuck in an infinite cycle of edits without leaving the place.
para acompanhar métricas e relatórios:: to monitor and keep the civility in your repositories GitHub.
Cartões com média/mediana de toxicidade,: Cards with average/median toxicity, total comments, resolved items, etc.
Atividade de moderação, incivilidades po: Moderation activity, incivilities by type, categories and actions taken.
Se algo ainda não ficou claro, volte aqu: If something is still unclear, come back here or open an issue in the bot's own repository. We are always improving!
Foque em um projeto específico ou visual: Focus on a specific project or visualize all at once.
Use esses dados para entender tendências: Use these data to understand trends, train your team and keep the community engaged in a respectful environment.
Para começar a usar o Peacemaker Bot, vo: To start using the Peacemaker Bot, you need to configure an LLM (Large Language Model) of your preference. Follow these steps:
Clique na sua foto de perfil no canto su: Click on your profile picture in the top right corner of the screen.
No menu que aparece, clique em 'Selecion: In the menu that appears, click on 'Select LLM' to configure your preferred model.
Faça login na sua conta OpenAI: Log in to your OpenAI account
Dê um nome para sua chave e copie o toke: Give a name to your key and copy the generated token
Cole o token no campo correspondente no: Paste the token in the corresponding field in the Peacemaker Bot
Faça login na sua conta Groq: Log in to your Groq account
Importante: Mantenha seu token em segura: Important: Keep your token secure and never share it. If you suspect your token has been compromised, revoke it immediately and generate a new one.
